price: ߊߟߊ߫߸ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߊ߬ߟߋ߬ ߞߐ߫ ߸ ߟߊߒߠߦߊߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߦߴߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߛߍ߲߬ߓߍ߬ ߊߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߟߊ߫
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلۡيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa waʿalā al-lahi falyatawakkali al-mu'minūna
